name: Heralded
description:
Some say when you die, your entire life flashes before your eyes.

Story:

Journey with Harold as he treads through his past while verged on the brink of death. As he faces his biggest regret to seek the closure he needs to set forth as an unencumbered soul, an unexpected message is received. A bid of farewell from that who has passed, that who has ascended, that who was heralded.

My first game! Created within 2 weeks for Harold's Last Stand Jam.
